verses.verse: And the courses <S%H4256><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> were these <S%H1121><s%>. The sons of Aaron <S%H175><s%>: Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.

But Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>, and had no children <S%H1121><s%>: therefore Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%> executed the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.

And David <S%H1732><s%> with Zadok <S%H6659><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, divided <S%H2505><s%> them according to their ordering <S%H6486><s%> in their service <S%H5656><s%>.

And there were more <S%H7227><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H1397><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> than of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>; and thus were they divided <S%H2505><s%>: of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> there were sixteen <S%H8337><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>; and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, eight <S%H8083><s%>.

Thus were they divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%>, one sort <S%H428><s%> with another <S%H428><s%>; for there were princes <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and princes <S%H8269><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, both of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.

And Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the scribe <S%H5608><s%>, who was of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, wrote <S%H3789><s%> them in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%>, and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiathar <S%H54><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> being taken <S%H270><s%> for Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and one taken <S%H270><s%> for Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.
Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> to Jehoiarib <S%H3080><s%>, the second <S%H8145><s%> to Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>,
the third <S%H7992><s%> to Harim <S%H2766><s%>, the fourth <S%H7243><s%> to Seorim <S%H8188><s%>,
the fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Malchijah <S%H4441><s%>, the sixth <S%H8345><s%> to Mijamin <S%H4326><s%>,
the seventh <S%H7637><s%> to Hakkoz <S%H6976><s%>, the eighth <S%H8066><s%> to Abijah <S%H29><s%>,
the ninth <S%H8671><s%> to Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, the tenth <S%H6224><s%> to Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%>,
the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> to Eliashib <S%H475><s%>, the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> to Jakim <S%H3356><s%>,
the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> to Huppah <S%H2647><s%>, the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> to Jeshebeab <S%H3428><s%>,
the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> to Bilgah <S%H1083><s%>, the sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> to Immer <S%H564><s%>,
the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> to Hezir <S%H2387><s%>, the eighteenth <S%H8083><s%> to Happizzez <S%H6483><s%>,
the nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> to Pethahiah <S%H6611><s%>, the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Jehezkel <S%H3168><s%>,
the one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Jachin <S%H3199><s%>, the two <S%H8147><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Gamul <S%H1577><s%>,
the three <S%H7969><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Delaiah <S%H1806><s%>, the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Maaziah <S%H4590><s%>.

This was the ordering <S%H6486><s%> of them in their service <S%H5656><s%>, to come <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> according to the ordinance <S%H4941><s%> given unto them by Aaron <S%H175><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, had commanded him <S%H6680><s%>.

And of the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>: of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%>, Shubael <S%H7619><s%>; of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shubael <S%H7619><s%>, Jehdeiah <S%H3165><s%>.
Of Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%>: of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%>, Isshiah <S%H3449><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>.
Of the Izharites <S%H3325><s%>, Shelomoth <S%H8013><s%>; of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomoth <S%H8013><s%>, Jahath <S%H3189><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron <S%H3404><s%>: Jeriah the chief <S%H568><s%>, Amariah the second <S%H8145><s%>, Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>, Jekameam <S%H3360><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>, Micah <S%H4318><s%>; of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, Shamir <S%H8053><s%>.
The brother <S%H251><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, Isshiah <S%H3449><s%>; of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Isshiah <S%H3449><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>: Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>; the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaaziah <S%H3269><s%>: Beno <S%H1121><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>: of Jaaziah <S%H3269><s%>, Beno <S%H1121><s%>, and Shoham <S%H7719><s%>, and Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, and Ibri <S%H5681><s%>.
Of Mahli <S%H4249><s%>: Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, who had no sons <S%H1121><s%>.
Of Kish <S%H7027><s%>; the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>: Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi <S%H4187><s%>: Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, and Eder <S%H5740><s%>, and Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%>. These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>.

These likewise cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> even as <S%H5980><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, and Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the chief <S%H7218><s%> even as <S%H5980><s%> those of his younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>.
